title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Furious pushback against notion of getting back to normal. Governor Kemp of Georgia wants to go back to work, becomes #1 target of the forces who do not want economy to reopen. NYT, Fox News savage Kemp. States are laboratories of democracy, let’s see how Georgia does. Kemp defends himself on Fox News, talks about economic devastation, balance between health and economy. CNN’s Sanjay Gupta rips Kemp: All risk and no reward. Kemp isn’t mandating businesses to open or citizens to patronize them. Dr. Birx on Georgia. CDC’s failed coronavirus tests were tainted with coronavirus, feds confirm. Left complains about gov’t shutdowns, but not this economic shutdown.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Michael Moore discovers electric cars use energy. AG Barr blasts stay-at-home orders. Local governments encourage snitching. The Turtle tells states to file for bankruptcy. Cuomo badly mismanaged New York. Rush doesn't think Michelle Obama wants to be VP. States plan to join Georgia in reopening. Hospitals are empty because of shutdown, losing money, killing jobs. Businesses can't stay closed forever, entrepreneurs will find ways to reopen. Georgia mayor says businesses in his town don't want to open.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush is so fired up about opening the country because he loves the people whose lives are being destroyed, instincts tell him to oppose the people who are too eager for this shutdown to continue. No evidence we have to put 22 million out of work to defeat the virus. No virus has ever been defeated by strategy we're using. Why economic harm isn't part of the model. Sweden didn't lock down, getting same results as rest of the world without economic destruction. Sweden compared to Michigan. We have to wait until the government allows us to play golf? Governor Cuomo: Economic hardship doesn't equal death. Buffalo nurse. Herd immunity explained.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
